title: [1.8-1.7.10][ssp/smp]More Commands&更多命令-100+的命令，单人和多人兼容！
author: Enderman|淡忘
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Enderman|淡忘 于 2015-5-10 15:34 编辑 

大家好，我是淡忘，我今天搬运的Mod是更多命令Mod
[water_buket]这个Mod类似于单机指令(spc Mod)，添加了将近100+的指令[water_buket]
[bed]灵感也来自于SPC Mod[bed]
[note_block]这个Mod不仅限于单人游戏，也可以使用于Minecraft 服务器[note_block]




作者原话

More Commands is a mod which adds over 100 Commands to the minecraft chat console. It is inspired by the Singleplayer Commands mod, which isn't developed further. I really liked this mod and it was the only mod I used extensively, but since it isn't developed anymore, I decided to write my own commands mod. Singleplayer Commands had to be entirely rewritten in the 1.3 update, because since this update, singleplayer is just an internal server and many commands had to be removed. I adopted many of the currently working commands but I also reimplemented many of the commands which have been removed. Nevertheless this mod is NOT just an update for Singleplayer Commands, I also added new commands, but the biggest difference is the way how the mod works. In contrast to Singleplayer Commands, you don't have to modify your minecraft.jar, because this mod is a Forge mod. This mod also uses the client-server model and is therefore NOT only restricted to singleplayer, you can also use it on a Forge Server.




[book]更新日志[book]

1.8-2.3
Update of version 1.7.10-1.3 to Minecraft Version 1.8

1.8-2.2Update of version 1.7.10-1.2 to Minecraft Version 1.8

1.8-2.1Update of version 1.7.10-1.1 to Minecraft Version 1.8

1.8-2.0Update of version 1.7.10-1.0 to Minecraft Version 1.8

1.7.10-1.2- Added command 'blocklight', which allows you to set the light level for each block- Added command 'calc', which is a basic calculator (brackets, plus, minus, modulo, multiply, divide and power)- Added command 'ignorespawn', which allows to prevent entities from spawning

1.7.10-1.2- Improved Command Block Support (if the player has the mod installed client side, client commands work too)- Added the "music" command (allows to play, skip and stop music)- Switched to an event driven network system.

1.7.10-1.1Added Command Block Support. Use Target Selectors (e.g. "@p[name=Player1,name=Player2,..]") as LAST Argument to target players. You don't need to specify players for every command (e.g. the "dodrops" command does not need a player)

1.7.10-1.0Initital release




[board]一个命令列表（可能需要翻墙）
